Show:

File: hotplate/node_modules/hotCorePage/lib/HeadLines.js


/*!
 * Module dependencies.
 */

var util = require('util')
  , path = require('path')
  , hotplate = require('hotplate')
;

/**
 * HeadLines constructor.
 *
 * An object to which you can add javascript files to, and render them
 *
 * @api public
 */

function HeadLines(){
  this.headLines = [];
  this.HeadLines = HeadLines;
}

/**
 * The exports object is the object's constructor
 *
 * @api public
 */

module.exports = exports = HeadLines;


/**
 * Javascript rendering function.
 *
 * This will return a string which can be dropped into the HEAD of an HTML page
 *
 * @api public
 */

HeadLines.prototype.render = function(){
  var r = '';
  this.headLines.forEach( function(item){
    r += item.line + '<!-- Added by ' + item.module + " -->\n";
  });
  return r;
}

/**
 * Add a JS file
 *
 * @param {String} The module's name
 * @param {String} The file's full path
 * @return {Jsses} this
 * @api public
 */

HeadLines.prototype.add = function(module, line ){
  this.headLines.push( { module:module, line: line } );

  return this;
}
